If yes, define format and add to Tau2025Roundup.md.

items: Review Tau telemetry and triad updates before standup.
Pair with lead engineer on the top priority Swift module.
Record any pivot decisions and notify Cadence + Patch.
horizons.title: H0 — Daily

items: Publish a product note capturing Tau wins, risks, and open questions.
Approve DocC narrative updates from Quill and Dot.
Validate cost footprint of automation with rismay before Friday recap.
Coordinate with Carrie/Dot on Status helper entitlements and profiles; provide bundle IDs and app group context.
horizons.title: H1 — Weekly

milestones.title: Tau alpha demo ready
Profit capture and trailing stop strategies; broker hooks.
P/L journal writes with entity segregation.
Strategy-aware exits (calendars/diagonals/verticals) with sleeve guardrails.
Simulation/replay tooling.
Autonomous exit engine with human-in-the-loop overrides and governance logs.
Capture fills and write Notion Position/Strategy entries with entity segregation.
Integrate sleeve capacity metrics; attach preflight checks and artifacts.
Automate IRS-ready audit packs with summaries and diffs.
Compute Δ skew and vega/theta equilibrium across open strategies.
Flag convexity risk hot spots and produce Notion audit entries.
Automated governance trend reporting with exception feeds to Patch.
Publish daily EOD summaries; archive MD/JSON to governance store.
Status Menu: 24/5 SLO + stacked charts shipped
Tau app UI parity + detailed day drilldown
Integrate unusual flow and IV shift analytics; sector heatmap.
Automated governance trends and DocC exports.
Baseline summary template and sector/IV/UOA sections.
Notion export pipeline and archival structure.
Broker/market adapters; anomaly detection hooks.
Schedule and failure notifications.
Multi-tenant summaries by sleeve/entity and automated governance reports.
Notion schema alignment; execution ingest and de-duplication.
Entity-aware journal writes with audit snapshots.
Reconciliation against broker statements; discrepancy workflows.
ROC vs sleeve capacity dashboards.
End-to-end audit packs and payroll cadence alignment.
Define sleeve risk metrics and alert thresholds.
Implement exposure dashboards and PDF audits.
Add vanna/volga approximations; stress testing scenarios.
Broker integrations for positions/greeks.
Automated periodic governance packs and entity-level roll-ups.
Schema inventory; link rules for Markets → Sectors → Positions.
Notion API integration and idempotent updates.
Drift detection and repair suggestions.
Audit views for governance.
Cross-project semantic graph with lineage and provenance.
Profit capture and trailing stop strategies; broker hooks.
P/L journal writes with entity segregation.
Strategy-aware exits (calendars/diagonals/verticals) with sleeve guardrails.
Simulation/replay tooling.
Autonomous exit engine with human-in-the-loop overrides and governance logs.

principles: Automation: use Swift-based launchpad/scratch tools (SPM) and avoid Python for repository automation.

items: Add day drilldown window invoked from Uptime card (Tau + Status).
Implement per-day detail chart (stacked online/offline bins) respecting SLO (24/5, 8/5).
Wire SLO mode into detail view and keep in sync with main toggle.
Persist SLO preference (UserDefaults) and restore on launch.
Make chart bars tappable/clickable to open the detail window (accessibility included).
Add Swift Testing for aggregator around per-bin coverage and DST boundaries (8/5).
Add UI test to verify window opens and renders sample bins (smoke).
Document day drilldown behavior and examples in DocC (UptimeMetrics.md).
sections.title: Next Actions — Uptime drilldown view + tests

items: Wire preview Source toggle to detail window (Uptime|Online).
Persist SLO/Source toggles; expose a Commands menu shortcut.
Add Tau app online writer for parity with Status Menu writer.
Add Swift Testing for aggregator bins (Local/ET, DST, UTC splits).
Crash: NSToolbar layout recursion (Catalyst, macOS 26.1) — triage and fix. (see request: tau-crash-2025-10-03; codex backlog: codex-tau-crash-triage-2025-10-03)
Bug: time monitoring scoring returns constant 1 — reproduce and correct. (codex backlog: codex-time-monitor-scoring-bug-2025-10-03)
sections.title: Next

items: Reintroduce series‑aware hover via ChartSelection (see request: alphabeta-tau-uptime-chart-hover-selection).
Day drill‑down view with Source toggle and screenshots in DocC.
sections.title: Later

items: Refactor PublicLib to mirror the OmniBroker/TradierLib domain-oriented service structure. This improves discoverability, testability, and parity across broker integrations while preserving existing APIs.
sections.title: Imported — Public Libraries Steward: Objective

items: Introduce per‑domain folders under `Sources/PublicLib` (aligned to TradierLib):
QuoteService: market quotes, multi‑quotes, timesales (if available)
OrderService: order placement/preview/replace/cancel (as supported by Public)
ActivityService: account history/events (AccountHistory.swift)
PositionsService: portfolio/positions (Portfolio.swift)
ProfileService: user/account profile and balances (if API provides)
Auth: keep existing Auth flow but consider `AuthService/` for consistency
StreamingService: only if Public exposes streaming endpoints
Split monolithic client methods into per‑domain `PublicClient` extensions (e.g., `CodableService+Quotes.swift`).
Move Codable models and request types into the matching domain folders.
Add minimal DocC articles + tutorials mirroring the pattern in TradierLib.
sections.title: Imported — Public Libraries Steward: Scope

items: AccountHistory.swift → `ActivityService/` (requests + models)
Portfolio.swift → `PositionsService/` (positions/holdings)
Order.swift → `OrderService/`
Quote.swift → `QuoteService/`
PublicClient.swift / PublicHTTPClient.swift → keep core client bootstrap; move domain methods to `CodableService+*.swift` files.
Auth/ → keep as `Auth/` or `AuthService/` with clear entry points.
sections.title: Imported — Public Libraries Steward: Proposed Mapping (Initial)

items: Compile (`swift build`) and run existing tests (`swift test`).
Add DocC catalog with module landing, Services overview, Authentication, HTTP Requests, and Getting Started.
Update `swift-format` file lists if present.
sections.title: Imported — Public Libraries Steward: Verification

items: Public API coverage may differ from Tradier; ensure adapters or Common\* models map cleanly where used by OmniBroker.
Keep source compatibility: consider `@available(*, deprecated, message:)` if any renames are necessary.
sections.title: Imported — Public Libraries Steward: Risks & Considerations

items: Completed 2025-09-03. Refactor, tests, and DocC catalog in place.
sections.title: Imported — Public Libraries Steward: Status

items: Domain folders exist with methods, models, and requests split appropriately.
Build + tests pass; DocC pages render for key domains.
Consumers can adopt the new structure without breaking changes.
sections.title: Imported — Public Libraries Steward: Acceptance

items: StreamingService exploration (if Public exposes suitable endpoints).
CI: add docbuild target to ensure DocC stays healthy.
OmniBroker: implement Public‑backed Common services (Profile, Positions, Activity, Orders) and adapters.
sections.title: Imported — Public Libraries Steward: Next

title: Tau Agenda
